nodes.text: So guns are more important than the safety of women? Then the right of women abandoned by their husbands to know about the financial situation of their spouses in a divorce case?

I would agree with you, but first of all, the owner of the show has every right to not allow cameras. Second, it would be a huge invasion of privacy if all women knew what their ex wives could keep spying on what they buy and what they do. They have no buisness doing that.
But the large, stupid, uncivil man probably also packs a gun, probably even something like an AK7,

and you bace clame on what? that most violent crime is commited with out a weapon http://www.ojp.usdoj.gov/bjs/pub/pdf/wuvc01.pdf and that when a firearm is used 87% of the time it is a handgun (not an AK47, witch is a hollywood favorit, but not truth).
